kw.name: Set Variable

kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.msg: ${api_power} = 250
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: API Name: HPE ProLiant DL380 Gen10
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: API Power: 250
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: API Firmware: 2.42
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.msg: ${options} = <selenium.webdriver.chrome.options.Options object at 0x110b3fd70>
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Call Method
kw.doc: Calls the named method of the given object with the provided arguments.

kw.name: Call Method
kw.doc: Calls the named method of the given object with the provided arguments.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: Opening browser 'chrome' to base url 'https://localhost:5000'.
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.msg: Page title is 'HPE iLO Login'.
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'admin' into text field 'id=username'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.msg: Typing password into text field 'id=password'.
Temporally setting log level to: NONE
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.msg: Clicking button 'id=loginButton'.
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'id=sysName' contains exact text 'HPE ProLiant DL380 Gen10'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'id=pwrConsumed' contains exact text '250 W'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.msg: Verifying element 'id=iloFirmware' contains exact text '2.42'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Hybrid verification successful: API and UI data matches.
kw.arg: Hybrid verification successful: API and UI data matches.
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Test to verify consistency between Redfish API data and Web UI
